answer:
This issue should be temporary and related to the current measles cases in the lower mainland. Health units throughout BC are experiencing high call volumes. If you are calling a central immunization booking line, an alternative would be to contact the health unit your child is immunized at directly. Use the health unit finder. 
Immunization Nurse
question: I would like to book my daughter's 18 mo shots but when I call the clinic, the recording says there are 325 calls ahead of me, which seems a bit ridiculous. How else can I book?
